snippet: The American brothers Bob and Mike Bryan beat France’s Michael Llodra and Nicholas Mahut, 7-6 (4), 6-3, 6-2, in a Wimbledon semifinal Friday to return to a Grand Slam final for the first time since winning at Wimbledon last year.
abstract: American brothers Bob and Mike Bryan beat France’s Michael Llodra and Nicholas Mahut in Wimbledon men's doubles semifinal to return to a Grand Slam final for first time since winning at Wimbledon in 2013.
lead_paragraph: The American brothers Bob and Mike Bryan beat France’s Michael Llodra and Nicholas Mahut, 7-6 (4), 6-3, 6-2, in a Wimbledon semifinal Friday to return to a Grand Slam final for the first time since winning at Wimbledon last year.
